company.required: Select whether you're applying on behalf of a company or a sole trader

weapons-ammunition.required: Select what the company will handle

weapon-types.notBothOptions: You can't choose unspecified categories and choose a category. You must deselect the unspecified category option, or the selected categories to continue

weapons-unspecified-details.required: Explain why you can't specify the section and quantities of weapons/component parts being handled

ammunition-types.notBothOptions: You can't choose unspecified categories and choose a category. You must deselect the unspecified category option, or the selected categories to continue

ammunition-unspecified-details.required: Explain why you can't specify the section and quantities of ammunition being handled

authority-holders.one: Enter the full name of the authority holder
authority-holders.two: Enter the full name of the first authority holder

second-authority-holders-name.required: Enter the full name of the second authority holder

first-authority-dob.future: Date cannot be in the future

first-authority-holders-nationality-seco.same-first-nationality: Second nationality cannot be the same as the first nationality

first-authority-holders-nationality-thir.same-first-nationality: Third nationality cannot be the same as the first nationality
first-authority-holders-nationality-thir.same-multi-nationality: Third nationality cannot be the same as the second nationality

second-authority-dob.future: Date cannot be in the future

second-authority-holders-nationality-sec.same-first-nationality: Second nationality cannot be the same as the first nationality

second-authority-holders-nationality-thi.same-first-nationality: Third nationality cannot be the same as the first nationality
second-authority-holders-nationality-thi.same-multi-nationality: Third nationality cannot be the same as the second nationality
